examples.example: 我们的球队在比赛中展现出了顽强拼搏的精神和高超的技艺。

translate.english: Our team showed a tenacious fighting spirit and superb skills in the competition.

examples.example: 我们的球队一路过关斩将，最终赢得了比赛的冠军，大家都无比兴奋。

translate.english: Our team won the championship of the game after going through all the way and everyone was extremely excited.

examples.example: 我们的球队团结一心，在赛场上尽情挥洒着汗水，努力为胜利拼搏。

translate.english: Our team is united as one, sweating freely on the field and striving hard for victory.
